summary: Not all chests are what they appear...
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that makes certain types of chests apply estrus on the player or followers when opened. This happens at random and has a user configurable chance of happening.

Also, this is my first mod.
[line]
[b]What this mod actually does:[/b]

When the player or a follower opens an affected chest (see list below) there is a chance that the chest will contain a single gold coin. Upon closing the chest, it will disappear and one of the estrus animations will be started on the player. The animation played will use all of your settings for EstrusForSkyrim. Which animation plays can be configured in the included MCM menu.

Using a locked chest will not trigger a mimic, but opening the locked chest (after unlocking it) will. Opening a chest while underwater has no chance of triggering a mimic.

The chance of chest being a mimic can be changed using the included MCM menu as can the animation played.

This mod currently does not affect any chests that are unique to the Dragonborn DLC. I tried to do this, and it didn't work for some reason. I will look into it eventually.
[line]
[b]Required Files:[/b]

EstrusForSkyrim - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33102]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33102[/url]
SkyUI - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863[/url]
SKSE - (if for some insane reason you don't have this already...)
[line]
[b]Installing:[/b]

Dump all the included files into your skyrim data directory.
Add the included esp to your load order. (Load it after zzEstrus.esp)
If you are installing into a game you have already started, mimics probably won't appear in areas you have already visited until the area resets.
[line]
[b]Upgrading:[/b]

To upgrade, do the following:
[list=1]
[*] Find a good place to save well away from any possible mimics and save your game to a new save. Whiterun should work well enough for this.
[*] Uninstall your old version of Estrus Mimics
[*] Load your save, wait a minute or 2, then save your game on a new save.
[*] Install the latest version of Estrus Mimics
[*] Load your most recent save and reconfigure the mod in the MCM. (You may have to wait a minute for the menu to register.)
[/list]
[line]
[b]Uninstalling:[/b]

Remove/delete all packaged files from your Skyrim directory.
[line]
[b]List of affected chests:[/b]

[list]
[*]Bandit chests
[*]Draugr chests and urns
[*]Dwemer chest and dressers
[*]Falmer chests
[*]Forsworn chests
[*]Giant chests
[*]Overworld chests (e.g. the chest at the end of a treasure map)
[*]Vampire chests
[*]Witch/Hagraven chests
[*]Wizard chests
[/list]

Note: just because a chest is in a wizard lair does mean it is a wizard chest. It is all based on the creation kit.
[line]
[b]Chests that have been left unaffected:[/b]

[list]
[*]Unique chests -- e.g. the urn at the end of the dark brotherhood questline
[*]Chest/Dressers/etc in homes and houses -- People don't keep these things around their homes.
[/list]
[line]
[b]Change Log[/b]
2.2.0
[list]
[*]Added option to allow boss chests to be mimics also.
[*]Added option for mimics to still have loot in them. (may not always work, let me know)
[/list]
2.1.0
[list]
[*]No public release - you didn't miss anything
[*]Added option to make mimics trigger on both you and your follower. Did not test with UFO so someone tell me how it goes.
[/list]
2.0.0
[list]
[*][b]Follower support added! Woot![/b]
[*]Fixed the obnoxious empty chest bug once and for all (hopefully).
[/list]
1.3.1
[list]
[*]Fixed a bug where a mimic would be completely empty. I think. Hopefully.
[*]Note: v1.3.1 changes were minor enough that I haven't done any significant testing. Please report bugs.
[/list]
1.3.0
[list]
[*] Changed the mimics from being empty to containing a single gold coin. This is part of a fix for a bug where the mimic would sometimes not empty itself on opening. As a side effect of this fix, changes to mimic chance are no longer retroactive. If there is enough demand, I will look at possibly making changes retroactive again, but doing so will be difficult. In the meantime, mimic chance will only effect chests in areas you have not been in before, or areas that have reset since the last time you were in them (30 game days for cleared areas, 10 for all other game areas).
[*] Fixed chests that have been triggered as a mimic never reappearing. Chests should not reset with the dungeon.
[/list]
1.2.0
[list]
[*]Added MCM configuration options for each group of chests.
[*]Cleaned up scripts.
[/list]
1.1.0
[list]
[*]Added an MCM menu. No longer will you have to use the console like a lowly peasant to change the mimic chance.
[/list]
1.0.1
[list]
[*]Prevented mimics from triggering while swimming. Drowning while the animation was playing causes the game to crash.
[/list]
author: unknownPlunger
